name: Bull Cow - Word Finding
description:
A short text based puzzle game in which you must find Hidden Words. 

This game was made in Unreal Engine 4 using custom C++ scripts. It was made while taking the online course, Unreal Engine C++ Developer course.

Art Assets were not made by me. However some of the terrain was created by me using the unreal terrain editor.

Please see the forum posts that I made showing my progress as I designed this game:

https://community.gamedev.tv/t/cows-bulls-game/148259

Controls:

TAB - Allows you to type in the console/wooden sign

WASD - Allows you to move around the small area to check out the terrain and other details

QE - Allows you to move up and down

Mouse - Use to look around
